items.headline: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?
items.summary_en: “I’m sick of reading how many millions everyone has.”

items.headline: Actress Lori Loughlin sells Palm Desert home for $16.5 million after split with husband
items.summary_en: Former “Full House” star Lori Loughlin and her estranged husband, Mossimo Giannulli, have sold a second home in as many months after announcing they have split.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
items.summary_en: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: BP CEO quits after less than two years. A former Exxon exec who ran Australia’s largest oil company will take over.
items.summary_en: BP on Thursday made an abrupt shift in leadership, as CEO Murray Auchinloss is stepping down immediately after less than two years on the job.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: It’s time to take profits in silver after record-breaking run, these analysts say
items.summary_en: Histrorically, after years of 100% returns or better, the following twelve months are generally poor for silver.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
items.summary_en: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Trump announces $1,776 ‘warrior dividend’ for U.S. troops as economic worries persist
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump on Wednesday night rolled out a fresh effort to send payments to Americans worried about the high cost of living, as he announced a “warrior dividend” for U.S. military personnel during a prime-time speech to the nation.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Activist investor Elliott reportedly takes $1 billion stake in Lululemon, eyes new CEO
items.summary_en: Activist investor Elliott Management has taken a sizeable stake in Lululemon Athletica and has a potential CEO candidate in hopes of turning around the company’s fortunes, according to a new report.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: DoorDash joins Instacart in the newest shopping battleground — ChatGPT
items.summary_en: DoorDash Inc. on Wednesday said it had joined forces with OpenAI to allow people to shop for groceries in ChatGPT and check out on the delivery platform itself, as artificial intelligence becomes a bigger competitive front for online shopping.
